original_text: But the Levite did not want to stay there for another night. So he left with his two donkeys and his wife. They travelled as far as Jebus, which is now called Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그 사람이 다시 밤을 지내고자 하지 아니하여 일어나서 떠나 여부스 맞은편에 이르렀으니 여부스는 곧 예루살렘이라 안장 지운 나귀 두 마리와 첩이 그와 함께 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the Levite did not want to stay
to stay there for another night
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 또 다른 밤을 머무르기 위해

sentences.original_text: So he left with his two donkeys
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 나귀 두 마리와 함께 떠났다

sentences.original_text: They travelled as far as Jebus
